summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS  STOP WORKING WHILE DRIVING IN THE RAIN WITHOUT ANY NOTICE AT ALL. HAD TO PULL OFF THE ROAD AND GET OUT IN THE RAIN AND TRAFFIC TO LOOK UNDER THE HOOD TO SEE IF THERE WAS ANY THING I COULD DO TO FIX THE PROBLEM.  COULD NOT FIX THEM SO I HAD TO WAIT UNTIL THEY WANTED TO WORK TO FINISH DRIVING TO WORK..   WINDSHIELD WIPERS WORK WHEN  T H E Y  WANT TO , THIS CAN BE VERY HAZARDOUS AT NIGHT OR DAY IN THE RAIN..I CHECKED ISUZU AND NO RECALLS AS OF 07-17-2003.   SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE BY THE DEALERS IR COMPANY'S. *JB                                            THANK YOU                                        DAVID L. BAREFOOT
